item.title: About
item.description: I’m Peter, a Software Engineer from Aotearoa New Zealand. I’ve recently moved to Montr√©al, Canada üçÅ having spent the past 5 years working for Trade Me in NZ. I’m passionate, friendly, and excited about building interesting systems that solve important problems. I’m currently learning French and spending a bit more time tinkering in small open source projects. In my spare time I play guitar and ski. I like podcasts, Studio Ghibli movies and making silly things in code for fun.

item.title: Experience
item.description: Work Senior Full Stack Developer ‚Ä¢ Trade Me 2019 - 2025 Trade Me is New Zealand’s largest online marketplace, and 5th most visited website. My final role was working in the Marketplace team, building features for high-volume sellers. Angular TypeScript SCSS .NET C# ElasticSearch Google Cloud GitLab Data Analyst ‚Ä¢ CCS Disability Action 2018 - 2019 Node.js JavaScript MongoDB Developer Intern ‚Ä¢ Snapper 2016 - 2017 Android Java AWS Education BSc in Computer Science ‚Ä¢ Victoria University of Wellington 2016 - 2019

item.title: Now
item.description: I’m living in Canada now. This really is just a test to create this page.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Dot Match 2024 A match-three game where you align dots of the same colour to score points. Built with HTML Canvas and TypeScript, using a simple NoSQL database to store high scores and feature requests. Hosted on Google Cloud. TypeScript Python Flask Cloud Run Firestore Wet Bulb Calculator 2023 A single-component web app that takes temperature and humidity values and returns a ‘wet bulb temperature’ - the temperature the body can reach with evaporative cooling.

item.description: This second test page! {{ range .Pages }} <div class="section__item"> <div class="section__item-head"> <h4><a href="{{ .RelPermalink }}">{{ .Title }}</a></h4> <p class="section__item-period">{{ .Date.Format "Jan 2, 2006" }}</p> </div> <div class="section__item-content"> <div> <p class="section__item-description">{{ .Summary }}</p> <a href="{{ .RelPermalink }}" class="section__view-all">Read More ‚Üí</a> </div> </div> </div> {{ else }} <p>No posts found.</p> {{ end }}
